    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        public CalEvent[] doInBackground(java.lang.String... url)

      • urlToCalEvents

        public static CalEvent[] urlToCalEvents(java.lang.String url)
        Parameters:
        url - The url to the iCal calendar
        Returns:
        a list of the events in the calendar located at the url
        Use:
        events = urlToCalEvents(url)
        Pre:
        url is a valid url pointing to a iCalendar file
        Post:
        events is the list of the events in the calendar cal, null where parsing or arguments were wrong

      • urlToString

        public static java.lang.String urlToString(java.lang.String url)
        Takes an url and fetches its contents into a string
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the website to be downloaded
        Returns:
        the string with the content of the url
        Use:
        s = urlToString(url)
        Pre:
        url is a valid url
        Post:
        s is the string that the url contained if successful, empty string otherwise.

      • parseCalendar

        public static CalEvent[] parseCalendar(java.lang.String calendar)
        Takes a string containing an iCal calendar and returns a list of the events in the calendar
        Parameters:
        calendar - A string of an iCal calendar
        Returns:
        a list of the events in the calendar cal
        Use:
        events = parseCalendar(cal)
        Pre:
        cal is a calendar on the ical format,
        Post:
        events is the list of the events in the calendar cal, null where parsing or arguments were wrong

      • getICalValue

        public static java.lang.String getICalValue(java.lang.String[] event,
                            java.lang.String type)
        Takes an string array containing an iCal event, and returns the value of the type
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be parsed
        type - the type of the value to be fished out
        Returns:
        the value of the type type in the event
        Use:
        val = getICalValue(e,t)
        Pre:
        e is a iCal event
        Post:
        the value of the type t of the iCal event e.

      • removeCR

        public static java.lang.String[] removeCR(java.lang.String[] lines)
        Removes carriage returns in all string in an array of strings
        Parameters:
        lines - the lines for which the carriage return is to be removed from
        Returns:
        Use:
        l = removeCR(ls)
        Pre:
        ls is a array of strings
        Post:
        l is the same array of strings with all CR removed

      • calendarToEventList

        public static java.lang.String[][] calendarToEventList(java.lang.String calendar)
        Takes an iCal calendar string, and returns an array of string arrays each containing an event
        Parameters:
        calendar - a string that contains an iCal calendar
        Returns:
        an array of the events in the iCal calendar calendar.
        Use:
        calE = calendarToEvenList(cal)
        Pre:
        cal is a string that contains an iCal calendar
        Post:
        calE is an array of array of strings, where each entry is an string array of an iCal of the events in the calendar cal
